Articles.Content: Are there any tutorials on how to build a station in space or create a base on the surface of a celestial body? I prefer to play in career mode and know it is done with modules and EVA's but I can't figure out how.

Well, theres a mod KAS so you don't have to dock base modules: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53134-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-5-Struts-pipes-part-containers-and-more-%280-23%29

And, if you prefer to play stock, Temstar has a nice tutorial on it here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48876-The-art-of-modular-base-building

For space stations, i couldn't find anything specific, but you could probably find something helpful here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/search.php?searchid=1801679
